name: Hitori
description: Hitori is a classic hitori where you are to make certain cells dark enough so that no bright element repeats in each row and column. Dark cells can not stand side by side vertically and horizontally, and also surround light cells in the ring.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1800 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 100 MB available space
